review: Amazon hit a home run with the Fire TV Stick! This has replaced my Apple TV (besides for AirPlay display) for regular use. The Fire TV Stick is very responsive, full featured, and the apps make it a great gaming device as well.Pros: TONS of content, Instant access to the Prime videos and music library, and very responsive.Cons: Needs to be restarted every few days, sometimes freezes between TV episodes. BUT- Amazon helped and replaced my first Fire TV Stick very quickly after issues.I'd definitely recommend! Especially for Prime users.
